Compared to a rune scimitar, while the Katana has better defensive stats, it has 4 less strength bonus and is two handed, making the use of a defender or a shield in conjunction with it impossible.

Item ID12357

The katana is a two-handed weapon that can be obtained as a very rare reward from elite Treasure Trails. It requires 40 Attack to wield. Compared to a rune scimitar, while the Katana has better defensive stats, it has 4 less strength bonus and is two handed, making the use of a defender or a shield in conjunction with it impossible.

 Attack bonuses
+7+45+0+0+0
 Defence bonuses
+3+7+7+0-3
 Other bonusesSlot

Item sources[edit | edit source]

SourceLevelQuantityRarity
Reward casket (elite)N/A 11/1,250

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Its examine text refers to Hattori Hanzō, a famous samurai and ninja of the Sengoku era in Japan. The text itself may be a reference to Kill Bill, in which his descendant who shares his name is a swordsmith.
  • Ak-Haranu can be found wielding a katana in Port Phasmatys, as well as Lorelai in the Warriors' Guild basement.
  • The katana requires one hand to attack, however when it is equipped it uses both hands.

[[File:Katana detail.png|left|120px]]
The '''katana''' is a two-handed weapon that can be obtained as a very rare reward from [[Clue scroll (elite)|elite]] [[Treasure Trail]]s. It requires 40 [[Attack]] to wield. Compared to a [[rune scimitar]], while the Katana has better defensive stats, it has 4 less strength bonus and is two handed, making the use of a [[defender]] or a [[shield]] in conjunction with it impossible.

==Item sources==
{{Drop sources|Katana}}

==Trivia==
*Its examine text refers to [[wikipedia:Hattori Hanzō|Hattori Hanzō]], a famous samurai and ninja of the Sengoku era in Japan. The text itself may be a reference to ''Kill Bill'', in which his descendant who shares his name is a swordsmith.
*[[Ak-Haranu]] can be found wielding a katana in [[Port Phasmatys]], as well as [[Lorelai]] in the [[Warriors' Guild]] basement.
*The katana requires one hand to attack, however when it is equipped it uses both hands.
